Name: Coffee Negroni
Ingredients: 10 ml De Kuyper Crème de Cafe
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist & float 3 coffee beans.
POUR all ingredients into ice-filled glass.
Review: Gin-forward, boozy and bittersweet – as it says on the tin, this is a coffee-influenced Negroni – simple as that.
History: Created in January 2017 by yours truly at the Cabinet Room in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Coffee Negroni contains 173 calories
